name: Hungry Bug
description: A hungry bug throw a web up and try to catch foods. If you catch foods you need to protect it's a lots of enemies waiting to crash bug's web. When you complete hunts, earn money for upgrades. Foods have different money values. You can make 3 improvements according to the money earned. The first upgrade is about web length. The second upgrade increases the number of animals caught in the web. The latest upgrade provides offline gain. The player can earn money per minute while not in the game.
